mn85:4.3: bodhi kho → bodhi bho gotama (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
mn85:12.2: upasampajja viharāmīti pavedesī’ti → upasampajja pavedesīti (s1-3, km, pts1)
mn85:12.23: attano → idaṃ padaṃ bj, s1-3, km, pts1 potthakesu, attanā → attano (bj, s1-3, pts1)
mn85:12.28: āvuso → āvuso rāma (bj, s1-3, km, mr)
mn85:22.5: muddhani abhimattheyya → muddhānaṃ ūhananti (bj) | muddhānaṃ abhimattheyya (s1-3, km) | muddhānaṃ abhimantheyya (pts1)
mn85:26.6: arahato evarūpo hotī’ti → vihārotveveso arahato ti, Vihāro tveva so → vihārotveveso (bj)
mn85:27.5: ajjhohāressāma → ajjhoharissāma (bj, s1-3, km, pts1, mr)
mn85:27.7: ajajjitaṃ → ajaddhukaṃ (bj, s2, s3, km, pts1) | ajjukaṃ (s1), ajjhohāreyyuṃ → ajjhohareyyuṃ (bj, s1-3, km, pts1, mr)
mn85:44.21: aṇaṇa → anaṇa (bj, s1-3, km, pts1, mr)
mn85:44.22: Desassu → desessu (s1) | desetu (s2, s3, km, mr)
mn85:49.21: Andhībhūtasmiṃ → andhabhūtasmiṃ (bj, s1, pts1) | andhabhūtasmi (s2, s3)
mn85:49.27: tasmāhamupaka → tasmāhaṃ upakā (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
mn85:49.28: hupeyyapāvuso’ti → huveyya pāvusoti (bj, pts1) | huveyyāvusoti (s1-3, km)
mn85:55.5: aṅkusagayhe → aṅkusagaṇhe (s1-3, km), hatthārūḷhe → hatthāruyhe (bj) | haṭṭhārūyhe (pts1)
